page.title: 05Problems of country life
page.content: The biggest problem is transport. You have to have your own. Most peoples cars do at least 10000 miles every year and they have to use them.There is a railway not far away but you have to use a car to get there.There are very few buses and they only go on the main roads.It is hard in the winter because the little lanes get blocked with snow very easily and we have to stock up the deep freezes.You cannot pop down the road to get something. Most people shop once a week and go to big places like Hereford (40miles) every now and then. Most children like living in the country but they often don't see friends very often out of School because they live a long way off and you have to be taken by car. Shopping costs a lot in the country places and so does petrol.
